title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin points out the media's overreaction to Draymond Green punching a teammate after the Warriors announce he'll return to the team without suspension. He explains why Dak Prescott should not be considered a super star QB in today's NFL. Despite their recent success, he believes this NFC team is getting too much hype. Nick Wright from First Things First joins the show to tell Colin the biggest problem with Draymond Green's altercation.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
